content:
Russian invaders continue to fire the border areas of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. In total, 75 shelling (490 explosions) from different types of weapons were charged during the day.

About thisinformsOperational Command "North".

Two communities of Chernihiv region were under enemy shelling.

Semeniv community:

  • MHA - 4 explosions, probably become artillery; 1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Karpovichi - 2 explosions, probably become artillery; 2 shelling: 22 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 1 explosion, probably discharge of UAV SVP.
  • Spinning - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.

Snovsk community:

  • Kuts - 2 shelling: 13 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Bridges - 8 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Mill - 18 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Yeline - 2 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Hrinivka - 3 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Guta-Studnetska-11 explosions, probably become artillery.

Three districts of Sumy region fired the enemy for the past day.

Sumy District:

  • The big fish - 10 explosions, probably RSZV. The shelling damages 4 private homes.
  • Golishevsk - 3 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Oleksiivka - 5 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Mogrits-2 shelling: 2 explosions, probably FPV-Dron; 1 explosion, probably dropping the UAV.
  • Turia - 1 explosion, probably discharged from UAV.
  • High - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Basivka - 10 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Kindrativka - 10 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Pavlivka - 6 explosions, probably barrel artillery; 2 explosions, probably discharge from UAV.
  • Miropillya - 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Gardens - 1 explosion, probably reset the UAV.
  • Krasnopillya - 9 explosions, probably RSZV; 3 explosions are probably a barrel artillery.
  • Yunakivka - 4 explosions, probably RSZV; 4 shelling: 48 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Volfine - 2 shelling: 10 explosions, probably mortar 82mm; 3 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Posting - 6 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Grabovske - 4 explosions, probably at the helicopter.
  • Katerynivka-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron; 4 explosions, probably become artillery; 2 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.
  • Bilopillya - 6 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Divination - 4 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Steppes - 5 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Khmelivka - 4 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Iskrykivshchyna - 4 explosions, probably become artillery; 5 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Rims - 2 shelling: 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 2 explosions, probably FPV-Dron.

Okhtyr District:

  • The village - 14 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Dmitrovka-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Free - 5 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Soldier - 1 explosion, probably room.
  • Boumer - 2 explosions, probably rocket strike. The shelling damages administrative buildings, civilian infrastructure and private homes.
  • Away - 6 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Great Pisarivka - 7 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Popivka - 30 explosions, probably RSZV; 14 explosions, probably become artillery; 2 shelling: 24 explosions, probably at the helicopter.
  • Rider - 25 explosions, probably RSZV; 2 shelling: 22 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Lugovka - 7 explosions, probably barrel artillery.

Shostka district:

  • Znob-Novgorod-2 shelling: 14 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Photo surviving - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Znob-Trubchevskaya-2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Walking - 6 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Old Huta - 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • White birch - 11 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Big birch - 4 explosions, probably RSZV.
  • Sidorivka - 9 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Fortunately, information about the dead or wounded among the local population is not recorded.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Sumy Ova commented information aboutThe new massive offensive of the Russians.
